fields_of_interest: Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: We are interested in initiatives to do with climate change, and energy, and in particular decommissioning of nuclear facilities and the storage of radioactive waste materials and CO2
membership:
We are members of the Employee Ownership Association. 
 
Individuals who work for us are members of the Institute of Physics, The Nuclear Institute and the Royal Geological Society

goals__remit: Quintessa provides scientific & mathematical consultancy, contract research and software to address the energy and environmental challenges of the 21st century
